address.addressline: New York University Abu Dhabi, C-2

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-05-21 18:12:00 +0400 .
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script .

repository.corpname: NYU Abu Dhabi, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Ahmed Zaki Abu Shadi family papers

physdesc.extent: in 37 document cases, 5 record cartons, and dozens of loose books.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Papers, manuscripts, photographs, art works, ephemera, and realia of the Egyptian poet, publisher, physician and bee scientist, Ahmed Zaki Abu Shadi (1892-1955), as well as related material from his immediate family, including his daughter, Safeya Abushady (1923-2013), as collected and assembled by his granddaughter, Joy Amina Garnett.
